trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os valores para o estado do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> property uses SynthesizerState to indicate the current state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>propriedade usa SynthesizerState para indicar o estado atual de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> properties use SynthesizerState to indicate state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>Propriedades usam SynthesizerState para indicar o estado do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>quando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>é gerado.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A>
Indica que o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> está em pausa.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is ready to generate speech from a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> está pronto para gerar fala a partir de um prompt.
